S08n662:1: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
S08n662:2: asti mañjuśrīḥ ! aparamapi tvadīyapaṭavidhānaṃ sādhanaupayikaṃ sarvakarmārthasādhakam |
S08n662:3: etenaiva tu ekākṣareṇa hṛdayamantreṇa ṣaḍākṣareṇa vāmakarāntena tvadīyena mūlamantreṇa vā ṣaḍakṣarahṛdayena omkārādyena ekākṣareṇa vā paṭasyāgrataḥ asyaiva kalpaṃ bhavati |
S08n662:4: paścime kāle paścime samaye mayi tathāgate parinirvṛte śūnye buddhakṣetre yugādhame prāpte atrāṇe loke aśaraṇe aparāyaṇe idameva kalparājā trāṇabhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati |
S08n662:7: ādau tāvat pūrvamevānāhate paṭe keśāpagate saptahastāyate tṛhastapṛthake sadaśe kuṅkumacandanarasaparyuṣite buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ likhayet |
S08n662:9: dakṣiṇe pārśve sudhanaṃ subhūmiṃ āryākṣayamatiṃ mañjuśriyaṃ ca bhagavato namaskāraṃ kurvantaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāṅgaṃ vāmapārśve samantabhadraṃ āryāvalokiteśvaraṃ bhadrapālaṃ suśobhanaṃ ca lekhayet |
S08n662:14: upariṣṭācca vidyādharakumārau mālādhāriṇau meghāśca varṣamāṇāḥ savidyutā lekhayitavyāḥ |
S08n662:15: sarve ca bodhisattvā puṣpamāṇā yo bhagavato mukhaṃ vyavalokayantaḥ kartavyāḥ |
S08n662:17: tamīdṛśaṃ paṭaṃ sadhātuke caitye sthāpya paścānmukhamakṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
S08n662:18: asya mañjuśriyaḥ kāṣṭhamaunī triḥkālasnāyī tṛcelaparivarttī satatapoṣadhikaḥ śākayāvakayathābhaikṣabhaikṣāhāraścaturbhāgamannaṃ kṛtvā ratnatrayasya bhāgamekaṃ anyaḥ mañjuśriyaḥ anyat sarvasattvānāṃ śeṣamātmano payuñjīta |
S08n662:19: akṣāntakāyo manasi bhagavantaṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānālambanena manasā nātmārthamahaṃ kiñcit karomi kariṣyāmyanyatra sarvasattvānāmarthāyeti dhyātvā jāpaṃ kuryāt |
S08n662:20: snānaṃ gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ pradīpāṃśca dadyāt |
S08n662:21: snāpanaṃ paṭacchāyāyāḥ gandhānadhastāt puṣpāṇi ca baliṃ ca satataṃ dadyāt |
S08n662:23: ratnatrayasya paścānmaitreyasya tadanantaramavalokiteśvarasya āryasamantabhadrasya āryākāśagarbhasya āryākṣayamateḥ kumārabhūtasya candraprabhasya sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaḥ āryavajradharasya āryatārāyāḥ āryamahāmāyūryā āryaparājitāyāḥ bhagavatyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāśca gandhaṃ puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ baliṃ ca sarvameteṣāṃ pūrvaṃ datvā paścāt paṭasya dadyāt ||
S08n662:24: paścād bahirekasmiṃ pradeśe sarvoṣṭragardabhaśvahastirūpāṇi vināyakāni valmīkamṛttikayā kṛtvā teṣāṃ cāśeṣaṃ dadyāt |
S08n662:36: japakāle bhagavato'tha mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya mukhamavalokya jāpaṃ kuryāt |
S08n662:39: anena vidhinā pūrvasevāṃ kṛtvā paṭaṃ kvacit svasthe sthāne sthāpya karma kuryāt |
S08n662:42: paścād bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ śvetacandanamayaṃ padmāsanasthaṃ bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ ekahaste dadhānaṃ dakṣiṇena phalaṃ dadhānaṃ kārayet |
S08n662:43: tamekasmiṃ śucau pradeśe paścānmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā tasyāgrato'gnikuṇḍaṃ kuryāt |
S08n662:44: sarvakarma sacaturasraṃ dvivitastipramāṇaṃ adhaśca gandhāṃ sarvadhānyāni ca kṣipet |
S08n662:46: anena vidhinā navamagnimutpādya aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ athavāśokasya vā ghṛtatandulodanaṃ kṣīradadhi madhu ca sarvamupahṛtya tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā aṣṭasahasraṃ parijapya pūrṇāhutiṃ dadyāt |
S08n662:47: paścādanyasmiṃ dine śuklapratipadamārabhya karma kuryāt aśvatthasamidbhiragniṃ prajvālya vigatadhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā agnimāvāhayet |
S08n662:48: “āgaccha haripiṅgala ! dīptajihva ! lohitākṣa ! haripiṅgala ! dehi dadāpaya svāhā ||”
S08n662:51: “āgacchagaccha kumārabhūta ! sarvasattvārthamudyato'haṃ sāhāyyaṃ me kalpaya gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca pratigṛhṇa svāhā ||”
S08n662:53: āgatasya cārgho deyaḥ sugandhapuṣpapānīyena paścāddhomaṃ kuryāt |
S08n662:55: evaṃ saptadivasāni ghṛtatandulāni tilayāvakena cāpyāyanaṃ kuryāt ||
S08n662:81: jātīkusumānāṃ jale ekaikaṃ puṣpaṃ gṛhītvā juhuyāt |
S08n662:82: avaśeṣaṃ khaṇḍaṃ yasya ghrāṇāya dīyate sa ghrāṇamātreṇa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:83: kuṅkuma kastūrikālavaṅgapuṣpaṃ ca mukhe prakṣipya japet |
S08n662:84: yena saha mantrayate sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:85: marīcamaṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya kruddho'pi vacanena priyo bhavati |
S08n662:90: mahati pratyūṣe'bhyutthāya jātīkusumasahitaṃ pānīyaṃ śucau pradeśe bhūmau juhuyāt |
S08n662:95: parasya kruddhasyāpi maitrīṃ bhāvayittvā anusmṛtya mukhaṃ vyavalokayet |
S08n662:97: sarvasugandhapuṣpaiḥ homaṃ kuryād yamuddiśya karoti sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:101: puṣpāṇyabhimantrya yasya dadāti sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:105: vīrakrayakrītāṃ guggulusarjarasaṃ gandharasaṃ śrīvāsakaṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
S08n662:106: pañcamyāṃ pañcamyāṃ ṣaṇmāsam pūrṇe sahasraguṇaṃ labhate |
S08n662:107: sarvagandhaiḥ pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā tīkṣṇaśastreṇaikadhāreṇa cchitvā cchitvā juhuyāt |
S08n662:108: dakṣiṇena pādā puruṣasya vāmapādaṃ striyaḥ yamicchati sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:111: arkakāṣṭhairdhānyaṃ śirīṣapuṣpairaśvāṃ aśokapuṣpaiḥ suvarṇaṃ vyādhighātakapuṣpairvastrāṇi labhate |
S08n662:112: yad yadicchati tat sarvaṃ jātīkusumahomena karoti |
S08n662:115: saptajaptaṃ bhājanaṃ kṛtvā bhikṣāmaṭati bhikṣāmakṣayāṃ labhate |
S08n662:116: rātryāmutthāya parijapyātmānaṃ svayaṃ śobhanāni svapnāni paśyati ||
S08n662:117: atha rājānaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ tasya pādapāṃsuṃ gṛhītvā sarṣapaistailaiśca miśrayitvā juhuyāt |
S08n662:119: rājñīṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ sauvarcalāṃ śatapuṣpāṃ vārāhīṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
S08n662:121: rājamātyaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ bhallātakānāṃ tilāṃ vacāṃ ca pratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
S08n662:123: purohitaṃ vaśīkartukāmaḥ brahmadaṇḍīṃ śatapuṣpāṃ caikataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt |
S08n662:134: sarvānekataḥ kṛtvā juhuyāt sarve vaśyā bhavanti ||
S08n662:135: catuḥpathe ekaśūnye gṛhe vā baliṃ nivedya yo'sya glānaḥ sa tasmād vinirmukto bhavati ||
S08n662:138: sarvarogebhyaḥ mūśrakaṃ badhvā śikhā bandhaṃ kṛtvā svaptavyaṃ |
S08n662:146: pūrvoktena vidhānena anāhate paṭe keśāpagate āryamañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ ābhilekhyaḥ sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitaḥ |
S08n662:158: yatpramāṇānāṃ padmānāṃ rāśiṃ juhoti tatpramāṇānāṃ dīnārāṇā rāśī labhate |
S08n662:159: yāvad yāvat tāvajjapyamānāṃ na gṛhṇāti tāvad vidyādharacakravartī bhavati |
S08n662:179: anenaiva vidhinā puṣpāṇāṃ sugandhānāṃ lakṣaṃ pādamūle nivedayet |
S08n662:185: hastiskandhe mañjuśriyamagrato balasya dattvā darśanamātreṇaiva parabalasya bhaṅgo bhavati |
S08n662:191: pradīpānāṃ sahasraṃ dattvā ekapradīpaṃ padmasūtravarttiṃ kṛtvā madhuyaṣṭiṃ veṣṭayitvā prajvālya paśyed yathābhūtaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ paśyati ||
S08n662:193: sauvarṇaṃ rajataṃ vā kumāraṃ kṛtvā varadaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā |
S08n662:194: vāmena bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadhānaṃ tamīdṛśaṃ sadhātukakaraṇḍakaṃ purataḥ sthāpyākṣaralakṣaṃ japet |
S08n662:199: pūrvoktena vidhānenāvāhanavisarjanaṃ padmamudrāṃ badhvā jāpaṃ kuryāt |
S08n662:200: dhvajamudrāyā āvarttanaṃ svastikamudrayā āsanaṃ pūrṇamudrāyārghaṃ ekaliṅgamudrāyāṃ puṣpāṇi manorathamudrāyāṃ pradīpaṃ yamalamudrāyā dhūpaṃ mayūrāsanamudrāyā gandhaṃ yaṣṭimudrāyā baliṃ anena vidhānena rātrau dinedine kuryād yāvajjāpaparisamāptiriti |
S08n662:204: rātrau jātikusumaughaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svapet |
S08n662:205: bhagavantaṃ paśyati dharma deśayamānaṃ bodhisattvaparivṛtaṃ yamuddiśya karoti tadeva kama kuryāt |
S08n662:207: upoṣadhikena śuklapratipadamārabhya śrīvāsakadhūpaṃ madhumiśraṃ juhuyāt rājyaṃ labhate |
S08n662:208: koṭiṃ japet mañjuśriyaṃ svayameva paśyati dharmadeśanāṃ ca karoti |
S08n662:209: yadi kenacit sahollāpayati sammukhamavabhāṣate avaivarttikaśca bodhisattvo bhavati ||
S08n662:211: raktacandanamayaṃ kumārarūpiṇaṃ ekena pārśvena priyaṃkaraṃ anyena vīramatī sāśokavṛkṣāśrayāṃ kārayet |
S08n662:212: tamekapārśve sthāpayitvā lavaṇasarvaparājikāvyāmiśreṇa raktacandanapratikṛtiṃ kṛtvā cchitvā cchitvā juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:213: udumbaraphalāni yasya nāmnā juhuyāt sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:214: kākodumbarikāphalāni juhuyād yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:215: śṛṅgāṭakaṃ juhuyāt brāhmaṇavaśīkaraṇe padmamūlāni kṣatriyavaśīkaraṇe kaśerukāṇi juhuyāt |
S08n662:218: trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā juhoti sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:219: nimbapatrāṇi kaṭutailāktāni juhuyāt āhutyāṣṭasahasraṃ trisandhyaṃ saptāhaṃ yasya nāmnā sa vaśyo bhavati |
S08n662:226: brāhmīrasaghṛtasahitaṃ tāmrabhājane sthāpayitvā tāvajjaped yāvad daśasahasrāṇi paścāt pibet sarvavādino vijayate |
S08n662:227: yasya kruddhasyāṣṭasahasrābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā loṣṭaṃ kṣipet purataḥ sa krodhaṃ muñcati ||
S08n662:229: anāhate paṭe keśāpagate upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇakaiḥ āryamañjuśriyaścitrāpayitavyaḥ |
S08n662:230: padmāsanopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ darkṣiṇapārśve āryamahāmekhalā vāmapārśve cāryaprajñāpāramitā jāpavatī sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitā śuklavastranivasanā |
S08n662:232: bahuvidhapuṣpasaṅkīrṇaḥ nāgarājānau akāyavinirgatau padmadaṇḍadhṛtahastau āryāparājitā caikasmiṃ vighnavināyakāṃ nāśayantī agnijvālāmukhī bhṛkuṭīkṛtalocanāṃ anyasmiṃ pārśve āryaparṇaśabarī pāśaparaśuvyagrahastā kṛṣṇaraktanetrā mayūrapṛṣṭhabhirūḍhā sādhakaṃ parirakṣantī |
S08n662:233: sādhakaśca padmamālāvyagrahastaḥ bhagavato mañjuśriyamukhaṃ vyavalokayamānaḥ upariṣṭāccāmarapuṣpamālādundubhidhāriṇau devaputrau lekhayitavyau ||
S08n662:234: taṃ paṭaṃ paścānmukhaṃ sthāpya sadhātuke caitye koṭiṃ japet |
S08n662:235: japānte ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavatīṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vācayitvā daśasahasrāṇi japet |
S08n662:244: tasyaiva paṭasyāgrataḥ kapilāyāḥ samānavatsāyāḥ goghṛtaṃ gṛhya tāmrabhājane sthāpya tāvajjaped yāvadūṣmāyati |
S08n662:249: āmaśarāvasampuṭe sthāpya vacāṃ jātīkusumairveṣṭayitvā tāvajjaped yāvadaṅkurībhavati |
S08n662:251: anyāṃ koṭiṃ japet mañjuśriyaṃ sākṣāt paśyati |
S08n662:254: sauvarṇapadmaṃ śatapatraṃ kārayitvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tāvajjaped yāvajjvalatīti |
S08n662:255: tena gṛhītamātreṇa vidyādharāṇāṃ cakravartī bhavati parairadharṣaṇīyaḥ |
S08n662:256: manaḥśilāṃ haritālamañjanaṃ vā śrīparṇīsamudgake prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvat khuṭkhuṭāśabdaṃ karoti |
S08n662:258: khaḍgaṃ gṛhya sallakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇaṃ avraṇaṃ tāvajjaped yāvadahiriva phaṇaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhati |
S08n662:260: manaḥśilāṃ tṛlohapariveṣṭitāṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyatīti |
S08n662:264: śamīvṛkṣarūḍhasyāśvatthasya sāraṃ gṛhya tṛlohapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣipya tāvajjaped yāvacculuculāyati |
S08n662:266: rajataṃ cakraṃ kṛtvā asuravivarasyāgrataḥ tāvajjaped yāvaccakraṃ asurajantrāṇi bhittvā praviśati |
S08n662:269: lohamayaṃ tṛśūlaṃ kṛtvā tasmiṃ vivaradvāre jāpaṃ karoti tatra sarvayantrāṇi sphuṭanti |
S08n662:274: śvetārkamayaṃ aṅguṣṭhamātraṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kārayitvā arkapuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet |
S08n662:276: śvetakaravīramūlamayaṃ kṛtvā aṅguṣṭhamātrameva tatpuṣpāṇāmekāṃ koṭiṃ nivedayet mantrī bhavati |
S08n662:277: karahāṭavṛkṣamayaṃ vitastipramāṇamātraṃ kārayitvā tatpuṣpāṇāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet |
S08n662:279: śvetacandanamayaṃ vitastipramāṇamātraṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kṛtvā jātīkusumānāṃ lakṣaṃ nivedayet |
S08n662:281: aśvatthavṛkṣamayaṃ aṅgulamātrapramāṇaṃ bhagavantaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ kārayitvā akākolīne pānīyakumbhaṃ nivedayet |
S08n662:284: satattasamitamagarusamidhānāṃ juhuyāt mantrī bahujanasya sammato bhavati |
S08n662:291: yamuddiśya karmakaro tatrasthaṃ saptabhirdivasaiḥ grāmāntarasthaṃ ekaviṃśatibhirdivasaiḥ viṣayāntarasthaṃ caturbhiḥ māsaiḥ nadyantaritaṃ ṣaḍbhirmāsaiḥ svakulavidhānenānyamantravidhānena cāśeṣaṃ karmaṃ karoti varjayitvā kāmopasaṃhitam |
S08n662:299: mamaitat kathitaṃ kalpaṃ tasmiṃ kāle sudāruṇe ||
S08n662:308: etat karmasya māhātmyaṃ sādhakānāṃ tu jāpinām |
S08n662:311: amoghaṃ darśayet siddhiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yugādhame ||
